== Enderman ==
{{Infobox character
| title = Enderman
| image = MCMS Enderman.jpg
| residence = [[Ender Cave]]
| first_appearance = [[The Ender Cave]]
}}
'''Endermen''' appear where the heroes had to kill endermen to get [[Ender pearl]]s. At the beginning of the episode, the endermen were carrying blocks from place to place, and then after the test began, they fought the heroes. Then, in the middle of the episode, the last remaining enderman is absorbed by [[The Enderall]].

== Iron Golem ==
{{Infobox character
| title = Iron Golem
| image = MCMS Iron Golem.jpg
| residence = [[Arena Island]]
| affiliations = [[File:MCMSCommuniKateFace.png|16px]] [[CommuniKate]] (creator)
| first_appearance = [[The First Night]]

'''Iron Golems''' appeared at first time on challenges 1-6 exept 3, in all they stood near the challenge areas as security. Then, Iron Golems were seen taking [[Background Mobs (Mini-Series)#Donkey Robot|Donkey Robots]] somewhere. At the end of the series, after the show's contestants were sabotaged, [[CommuniKate]] summoned a group of Iron Golems to apprehend the trespassers, but they were all defeated.
